about_the_game:
Midnight Makeover: House Flipping with a Haunted Twist




This is a Haunted House Cleaning & Renovation Simulator!

Horror Meets Renovation

Welcome to a house-flipping experience like no other. In this haunted building, every renovation comes with a chill. You’re not just fixing up old spaces—you’re uncovering the deepest fears of humanity. Each room hides a story, and it’s up to you to turn these cursed spaces into homes, all while something sinister watches your every move.

Renovate, Clean, and Uncover Secrets

Take on the usual tasks of painting, cleaning, and repairs, but don’t get too comfortable. As you work, you’ll need to solve puzzles, uncover hidden crypts with UV light, and purify them with holy water. Every job is a battle against the unknown.


Earn, Upgrade, Survive

With each successful flip, you’ll earn money to upgrade your tools and skills. Better equipment means faster, safer renovations, but the challenges will only grow. The deeper you go into this haunted building, the darker the secrets you’ll uncover.

Stay Sane, Stay Alive

You’re never alone in this building, and the ghost inside will test your sanity at every turn. Safe Rooms offer brief moments of peace, but you’ll need to watch your back constantly. Losing your grip on reality means losing everything.

Progressive Terrors and Unseen Dangers

As you progress, the houses become more challenging, the encounters more terrifying. This isn’t just about making money—it’s about facing your fears and surviving the Midnight Makeover.
